review: A must watch movie if you are Emraan Hashmi fan (or even if you aren't). Plot and script is marvellous. Every character has justified their role beautifully. Superb suspense with a tremendous climax. You must go through the movie rather than reading the comments.
Very interesting movie specially on the second half. Emraan just rock the actresses done a fare job. Mohit Suri proves us many times that he is one of the best director in Bollywood.
It's a so much Fantastic Movie. in this movie, angry look of Emraan Hashmi looking so Fabulous. Everyone should watch this Fantastic Movie.

Emraan hashmi rocked with his performance as Siddharth Mehra..
Shamita shetty also acted very good as Sonia Mehra..The plot, Music,cast  all were at top.. this movie was very engaging thriller and a good message of relationship between husband and wife...
Awesome Experience And Thrilling Movie With Great Songs And Fantastic Acting By Shamita Shetty And Emraan Hashmi. A Must Watch For Me Anytime And For Everyone
Amazing story with amazing screenplay. Some wont understand ever what's called a great screenplay. Songs are lingering melodies.
Songs are very good in this movie. Story ending was not perfect. Average story but emran hasmi performed very good in this movie.
This movie in 2005 and a movie year before that in 2004 as Murder both are blockbuster thrillers by Emran Hashmi.One must watch as these are moralable..
